name: Death Star: Central Core (V)
LocationDStext: May deploy Superlaser from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  At 'blown away' systems, adds one [Light Side] and one [Dark Side].  Whenever you Force drain at a 'blown away' system Death Star orbits, may retrieve 1 Force.
LocationLStext: Opponent's Force drain bonuses at systems (except your systems) are limited to 1.  Immune to Expand The Empire.
